00019 namespace XmlRpc {
00020 
00021   // Arguments and results are represented by XmlRpcValues
00022   class XmlRpcValue;
00023 
00025   class XmlRpcClient : public XmlRpcSource {
00026   public:
00027     // Static data
00028     static const char REQUEST_BEGIN[];
00029     static const char REQUEST_END_METHODNAME[];
00030     static const char PARAMS_TAG[];
00031     static const char PARAMS_ETAG[];
00032     static const char PARAM_TAG[];
00033     static const char PARAM_ETAG[];
00034     static const char REQUEST_END[];
00035     // Result tags
00036     static const char METHODRESPONSE_TAG[];
00037     static const char FAULT_TAG[];
00038 
00044     XmlRpcClient(const char* host, int port, const char* uri=0);
00045     XmlRpcClient(const char* host, int port, const char* uri=0, bool ssl=false);
00046 
00053     XmlRpcClient(const char* host, int port, const char* login, const char* password, const char* uri=0);
00054     XmlRpcClient(const char* host, int port, const char* login, const char* password, const char* uri=0, bool ssl=false);
00055 
00057     virtual ~XmlRpcClient();
00058 
00069     bool execute(const char* method, XmlRpcValue const& params, XmlRpcValue& result);
00070 
00072     bool isFault() const { return _isFault; }
00073 
00075     const char* const host() const { return _host.c_str(); }
00076 
00078     int port() const { return _port; }
00079 
00081     const char* const uri() const { return _uri.c_str(); }
00082 
00083     // XmlRpcSource interface implementation
00085     virtual void close();
00086 
00090     virtual unsigned handleEvent(unsigned eventType);
00091 
00092   protected:
00093     // Execution processing helpers
00094     virtual bool doConnect();
00095     virtual bool setupConnection();
00096 
00097     virtual bool generateRequest(const char* method, XmlRpcValue const& params);
00098     virtual std::string generateHeader(std::string const& body);
00099     virtual bool writeRequest();
00100     virtual bool readHeader();
00101     virtual bool readResponse();
00102     virtual bool parseResponse(XmlRpcValue& result);
00103 
00104     // Possible IO states for the connection
00105     enum ClientConnectionState { NO_CONNECTION, CONNECTING, WRITE_REQUEST, READ_HEADER, READ_RESPONSE, IDLE };
00106     ClientConnectionState _connectionState;
00107 
00108     // Server location
00109     std::string _host;
00110     std::string _uri;
00111     int _port;
00112 
00113     // Login information for HTTP authentication
00114     std::string _login;
00115     std::string _password;
00116 
00117     // The xml-encoded request, http header of response, and response xml
00118     std::string _request;
00119     std::string _header;
00120     std::string _response;
00121 
00122     // Number of times the client has attempted to send the request
00123     int _sendAttempts;
00124 
00125     // Number of bytes of the request that have been written to the socket so far
00126     int _bytesWritten;
00127 
00128     // True if we are currently executing a request. If you want to multithread,
00129     // each thread should have its own client.
00130     bool _executing;
00131 
00132     // True if the server closed the connection
00133     bool _eof;
00134 
00135     // True if a fault response was returned by the server
00136     bool _isFault;
00137 
00138     // Number of bytes expected in the response body (parsed from response header)
00139     int _contentLength;
00140 
00141     // Event dispatcher
00142     XmlRpcDispatch _disp;
00143 
00144   };    // class XmlRpcClient
00145 
00146 }       // namespace XmlRpc
